casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Petition of DAILEY’S TOWING LINE, Inc., for Exoneration from and Limitation of Liability, as Owner of THE Steamtug MATTIE, Her Engines, Boilers, etc. No. 263. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 3, 1930. Maeklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer and Horace L. Cheyney, both of New York City, for appellant. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (Leonard J. Matteson, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
